short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Extension to automatically maximize YouTube video quality

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of constantly switching max video quality on YouTube manually?

Say no more. Take maximum from your YouTube experience. This web extension automatically turns on maximum available video resolution for you.

Also, you can easily enable / disable this behaviour in the popup.

It requires only minimal permissions and runs only on youtube.com. 
And it's open source, go check out the code if interested.

Best!
